DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Monoclonal antibody daclizumab locate tumor cell either kill deliver tumor-killing substance without harm normal cell . Peripheral stem cell transplantation brother sister may effective treatment hematologic cancer . Sometimes transplanted cell reject body 's tissue . Mycophenolate mofetil , tacrolimus , donor white blood cell may prevent happen . PURPOSE : Phase II trial study effectiveness mycophenolate mofetil , tacrolimus , daclizumab , donor peripheral stem cell transplantation treat patient hematologic cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Mycophenolate Mofetil , Tacrolimus , Daclizumab , Donor Peripheral Stem Cell Transplantation Treating Patients With Hematologic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine whether donor hematopoiesis safely establish use nonmyeloablative conditioning regimen follow HLA match sibling donor peripheral blood stem cell transplantation patient hematologic malignancy . II . Determine whether mixed chimerism safely convert full donor hematopoiesis treatment regimen patient . III . Determine toxicity incidence aplasia graft versus host disease patient treat regimen . IV . Determine antitumor potential treatment regimen patient . V. Determine role NFkB modulation cytokine secretion profile T lymphocytes alloimmune response patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : Patients receive immunosuppressive medication consist oral mycophenolate mofetil tacrolimus twice day begin day -8 continue day 45 ( absence graft versus host disease ) . Patients also receive daclizumab IV 30 minute day -1 , 3 , 8 . Patients undergo allogeneic peripheral blood stem cell ( PBSC ) transplantation donor CD34+ cell IV day 0 . If 0-80 % donor hematopoiesis , patient receive donor lymphocyte infusion CD3+ cell IV day 75 , 165 , 270 . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 10-45 patient accrue study .

The terminology `` indolent '' `` aggressive '' lymphoma replace former terminology `` low '' , `` intermediate '' , `` high '' grade lymphoma . However , protocol us former terminology .
